title: Battlefield & Ancient City
subTitle: 戰地風雲與古城巡禮：經典歷史路線
intro: Focus on the western part of Kinmen. Explore the Guningtou Battle Museum and the awe-inspiring Zhaishan Tunnel.

spots.name: Guningtou Battle Museum (古寧頭戰史館)
spots.description: Commemorates the decisive 1949 battle. See the anti-landing spikes on the beach and the nearby Beishan Broadcasting Wall.

spots.name: Zhaishan Tunnel (翟山坑道)
spots.description: An A-shaped granite tunnel built for supply boats during wartime. The reflection on the water is breathtaking.

spots.name: Qing Kinmen Military Headquarters (清金門鎮總兵署)
spots.description: The only remaining Qing Dynasty military headquarters in Taiwan-Fujian area. Visit the dungeon wax museum in the basement.

title: Exotic Vibes & Sunset
subTitle: 異國風情與夕陽大片：網美打卡路線
intro: Skip the heavy history and focus on visual impact. Visit 'Shamei Morocco' and the European-style Chen Jing-lan Western House.

spots.name: Shamei Morocco (沙美摩洛哥)
spots.description: Ruins reinforced with earth-colored cement, creating a North African desert vibe. A top IG spot.

spots.name: Chen Jing-lan Western House (陳景蘭洋樓)
spots.description: The largest western-style house in Kinmen, built by a Singaporean merchant. Facing the sea with beautiful white arches.

spots.name: Jiangong Islet (建功嶼)
spots.description: Accessible only at low tide via a stone path. Famous for the 'Oystermen' art installation and sunset views.

title: War & Diaspora Culture
subTitle: 穿越古今：戰地與僑鄉文化之旅
intro: Day 1 focuses on western battlefields; Day 2 explores eastern Minnan settlements and Wind Lion Gods.

spots.name: Beishan Ancient Western House (北山古洋樓)
spots.description: A western-style house riddled with bullet holes from the Guningtou Battle. A stark reminder of war.

spots.name: Shanhou Folk Culture Village (山后民俗文化村)
spots.description: The most complete Minnan settlement in Kinmen, featuring 18 orderly traditional houses. Try the oyster omelet here.

spots.name: Mashan Observation Post (馬山觀測所)
spots.description: The closest point to mainland China. You can see fishing boats on the other side through telescopes.

title: Bridge & Lieyu Hopping
subTitle: 大橋通車限定：大小金門跳島遊
intro: Utilize the new Kinmen Bridge to explore Lieyu (Little Kinmen). Visit landmine museums and enjoy taro ice.
transportation: **Scooter** (Watch out for strong winds on the bridge).

spots.name: Shuitou Settlement (水頭聚落)
spots.description: Famous for the Deyue Gun Tower and western-style mansions built by wealthy overseas Chinese.

spots.name: Landmine Exhibition Center (地雷主題館)
spots.description: Located in Lieyu. Walk through tunnels connecting two forts and learn about the history of demining.

spots.name: Shaxi Fort (沙溪堡)
spots.description: The westernmost point of Little Kinmen. The wooden boardwalk offers a stunning view of Xiamen's skyline.

title: Grand Tour: Land, Sea & Air
subTitle: 全島制霸：海陸空全體驗
intro: Cover all 5 townships. Hike Mt. Taiwu, see the abandoned tank on the beach, and cross the bridge to Lieyu.

spots.name: Oucuo Beach Tank (歐厝戰車)
spots.description: An abandoned M18 Hellcat tank half-buried in the sand. Only visible at low tide. A cinematic photo spot.

spots.name: Mt. Taiwu (太武山)
spots.description: Hike to the highest peak. See the famous 'Wu Wang Zai Ju' inscription and the ancient Haiyin Temple.

spots.name: Maestro Wu Knife Factory (金合利鋼刀)
spots.description: Witness how artillery shells fired during the war are turned into high-quality kitchen knives.

title: Slow Living: Old House & Eco
subTitle: 慢活金門：生態、古厝與咖啡
intro: Stay in a traditional Minnan house B&B. Watch cormorants return to their nests at dusk (winter) and enjoy local coffee.

spots.name: Zhushan Settlement (珠山聚落)
spots.description: Stay in a restored old house. Experience the tranquility of the village and traditional architecture.

spots.name: Special Tea House Museum (特約茶室展示館)
spots.description: Formerly a military brothel (Unit 831), now a museum and cafe with a unique atmosphere.

spots.name: Cihu Lake (慈湖)
spots.description: In winter, thousands of cormorants return here at sunset. A spectacular ecological sight.
